# sortDescriptors

**Instance Property**

A list of sort descriptors, specifying an order for the fetched objects.

## Declaration

```swift
var sortDescriptors: [NSSortDescriptor]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Construct sort descriptors with the properties of the objects that you want to fetch, listed in the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHFetchOptions] table. For example, the following code sorts by creation date to find the oldest asset in the photo library.



## Sorting and Filtering Fetch Results

- **predicate**: A predicate that specifies which properties to select results by and that also specifies any constraints on selection.

items.description: A predicate that specifies which properties to select results by and that also specifies any constraints on selection.
